about_the_game: The Digital Artbook and World Map of Bombshell gives you access to a beautiful artbook of the game and world maps that cover every level you will visit.
detailed_description: The Digital Artbook and World Map of Bombshell gives you access to a beautiful artbook of the game and world maps that cover every level you will visit.

name: Bombshell Digital Artbook and World Map

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 7 SP1, Win 8.1 (64-bit Operating System Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.67 GHz | AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 (2 GB Memory Minimum) | AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2 GB Memory Minimum)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
